function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Persistence of pathogens or vectors in soil, water, and pollutants","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement integrated pest management and environmental quality maintenance","Technologies":"Pest control technologies, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"General population, especially those exposed to contaminated environments","Owner":"Environmental agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Healthcare product shortages in high-income nations","Impact":"Inadequate supply of essential healthcare products during pandemics and emergencies","Mitigation":"Diversify supply chains, increase stockpiles, improve interchangeability of components","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, inventory management systems","People":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies","Owner":"Supply chain managers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence on global commodity chains with low cost, just-in-time inventory, and specialized divisions of labor","Impact":"Vulnerability to severe shortfalls during global crises and export restrictions","Mitigation":"Develop redundancies in supply chains, promote regional production, and reduce dependence on specific producer countries","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization systems, regional production technologies","People":"Global economy, trade organizations","Owner":"Trade organizations, economic development agencies"}]}
